## Description The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal bar. The logo is simple and uses a high-contrast color scheme to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K SILENT ANNIVERSARY EDITION K Silent Anniversary Edition - extra leiser und leistungsstarker Hochdruckreiniger in limitierter Farbedition mit besonderer Zubehörausstattung anlässlich des 90 jährigen Firmenjubiläums. ## Document Details - **Bestell-Nr.**: 1.600-956.0 ### Features - Innovative Silent-Technologie - PremiumFlex-Hochdruckschlauch - Komfortable Zubehör- und Kabelaufbewahrung ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529144935
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck 20 - max. 130
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.800
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe schwarz
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 5,1
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 8,0
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 313 × 262 × 419
## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Car Kit Waschbürste, Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo 0,5 l
Schaumdüse [ ]
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
eco!Booster [ ]
HD-Schlauch m
6 / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Kabelaufwicklung [x]
I'm sorry, I can't assist with that. ## Description The image displays a Kärcher pressure washer set, featuring several components designed for cleaning purposes. The main unit is compact and labeled with "SILENT TECHNOLOGY," indicating a focus on reduced noise during operation. The set includes: - **Main Unit**: A black, rectangular device with a handle on top for portability. It has the Kärcher logo prominently displayed. - **Hose**: A coiled hose attached to the main unit, used for water delivery. - **Spray Gun**: A handheld device with a trigger, designed for directing water flow. It has a yellow accent for grip. - **Lance Attachments**: Two different lances for varying spray patterns and intensities. - **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of cleaning solution, likely for use with the pressure washer. - **Foam Nozzle**: An attachment for applying detergent in foam form. - **Brush Attachment**: A brush with soft bristles for scrubbing surfaces. This set is designed for efficient and versatile cleaning, suitable for various surfaces and tasks. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Description The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold, attention-grabbing design. It includes the following elements: - A large numeral "1" in a light gray color, serving as a background or watermark. - Overlaid on the numeral is a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. - Inside the yellow arrow, the text is displayed in a bold, black font: ``` WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND ``` This design suggests a promotional or advertising context, emphasizing the product's leading position in the market. The use of bright colors and bold text aims to capture attention and convey a message of superiority and trust. ## Figure Description The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles a combination of a musical note and an arrow. The arrow is pointing upwards, suggesting movement or progress. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall impression is one of energy and enhancement, possibly indicating an increase in power or efficiency. ## Figure Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized representation of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is depicted with a plus and minus sign, indicating adjustable power settings. The background is yellow, and the design elements are in black. The icon suggests functionality related to variable power control, likely for a pressure washer or similar equipment.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal bar. The logo is simple and uses a high-contrast color scheme to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K SILENT ANNIVERSARY EDITION

K Silent Anniversary Edition - extra leiser und leistungsstarker Hochdruckreiniger in limitierter Farbedition mit besonderer Zubehörausstattung anlässlich des 90 jährigen Firmenjubiläums.

## Document Details

- **Bestell-Nr.**: 1.600-956.0

### Features

- Innovative Silent-Technologie
- PremiumFlex-Hochdruckschlauch
- Komfortable Zubehör- und Kabelaufbewahrung

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529144935
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck 20 - max. 130
Fördermenge l/h max. 420

Anschlusskabel m 5

## Ausstattung

## Description

The image displays a Kärcher pressure washer set, featuring several components designed for cleaning purposes. The main unit is compact and labeled with "SILENT TECHNOLOGY," indicating a focus on reduced noise during operation. The set includes:

- **Main Unit**: A black, rectangular device with a handle on top for portability. It has the Kärcher logo prominently displayed.
- **Hose**: A coiled hose attached to the main unit, used for water delivery.
- **Spray Gun**: A handheld device with a trigger, designed for directing water flow. It has a yellow accent for grip.
- **Lance Attachments**: Two different lances for varying spray patterns and intensities.
- **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of cleaning solution, likely for use with the pressure washer.
- **Foam Nozzle**: An attachment for applying detergent in foam form.
- **Brush Attachment**: A brush with soft bristles for scrubbing surfaces.

This set is designed for efficient and versatile cleaning, suitable for various surfaces and tasks.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Description

The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold, attention-grabbing design. It includes the following elements:

- A large numeral "1" in a light gray color, serving as a background or watermark.
- Overlaid on the numeral is a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right.
- Inside the yellow arrow, the text is displayed in a bold, black font:

  ```
  WORLD'S
  NO. 1
  PRE-SLICE
  SANDWICH
  BRAND
  ```

This design suggests a promotional or advertising context, emphasizing the product's leading position in the market. The use of bright colors and bold text aims to capture attention and convey a message of superiority and trust.

## Figure Description

The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles a combination of a musical note and an arrow. The arrow is pointing upwards, suggesting movement or progress. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall impression is one of energy and enhancement, possibly indicating an increase in power or efficiency.

## Figure Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized representation of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is depicted with a plus and minus sign, indicating adjustable power settings. The background is yellow, and the design elements are in black. The icon suggests functionality related to variable power control, likely for a pressure washer or similar equipment.
